system.requirements:
Tier 3: Shared Destiny, Strength through Conviction, Resistance (Fear), Jaded 
Aptitudes: Leadership, Willpower
system.effect:
Whenever Character or Ally within 10m gains Insanity, reduce amount gained by 1 (min 0). Allies within 10m can spend a Fate Point to automatically gain 0 Insanity.
Effects don't stack if multiple characters with this talent overlap their ranges.
